description: This file defines the PlayerDTO class, a Data Transfer Object used to convey player information (such as id, name, color, AI status, and turn order) in the backend of a game application. It includes getter and setter methods for these fields.

classes.name: PlayerDTO
classes.description: A data transfer object that represents player information sent to clients, including id, name, color, AI status, and turn order.

methods.name: setId
methods.description: Sets the player's id and returns the PlayerDTO object for chaining.

methods.name: setName
methods.description: Sets the player's name and returns the PlayerDTO object for chaining.

methods.name: setColor
methods.description: Sets the player's color and returns the PlayerDTO object for chaining.

methods.name: isAi
methods.description: Returns whether the player is controlled by AI.

methods.name: setAi
methods.description: Sets whether the player is controlled by AI and returns the PlayerDTO object for chaining.

methods.name: getTurnOrder
methods.description: Returns the turn order of the player.

methods.name: setTurnOrder
methods.description: Sets the turn order for the player and returns the PlayerDTO object for chaining.
